Ability: Choose one person at night to blackmail.

Attributes:
-Blackmailed targets cannot talk during the day.
-During Judgement, blackmailed target\'s message will be changed to \"I am blackmailed.\"
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become Mafioso
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target has secret information. They must be a Spy or Blackmailer.
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witchs
Win with Survivors

Ability: Investigate one person for its role.

Attributes:
-If there is no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.
-You can talk with other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone who will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target gathers information. They must be an Investigator or Consigliere.
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witchs
Win with Survivors

Abilities: Distract someone each night.

Attributes:
-Distraction blocks your target from using their role\'s night ability.
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso.
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
-You are immune to roleblock.

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Note: If you roleblock the Serial Killer, they will attack you instead.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target is a manipulative beauty. They are either an Escort or a Consort
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia

Win with Survivors
